Package com.busit

This package exposes the basic classes and interfaces accessible to connector developpers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectorHelper  
    Consumer
    This interface specifies that the connector can receive a message and end the chain.
    IConnector
    This is the basic routable interface for connectors.
    IContent
    This interface defines the properties of a message content.
    IFactory  
    IMessage
    This interface defines the basic public properties of a message that wraps data accross connectors.
    IMessageList
    This interface represents a list of multiple IMessage.
    Producer
    This interface specifies that the connector can emit a new message out of the blue.
    Transformer
    This interface specifies that the connector receives a message and forwards it to continue the chain.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connector
    This class is a simple ConnectorHelper implementation of IConnector which should make life easier.
    Factory
    This class can be used to get object instances for a set of interfaces.
    Interface
    This class maps the configuration of a connector interface (input or output) in corresponding fields

Package com.busit Description

This package exposes the basic classes and interfaces accessible to connector developpers.

Read this !

First step : take a look at what you should implement using
  • Consumer
  • Producer
  • Transformer
Second step : take a look at message types for maximum compatibility with IContent.

Advanced topic : if you wish to return multiple messages at once, you can use the IMessageList which is itself an IMessage.
.
